text:
@BBCWorld @BBCNews ONS today report that for 17 days in a row more than 1,000 people died every single day from Coronavirus.

Not sure UK government admitted to a single day where that figure was over 1,000.

During those 17 days we were ‘managed’. Just like we are being managed now.

#Covid19UK
